summary: Provides a Python implementation of an SMB version 3 client, handling connection establishment, protocol negotiation, authentication (NTLM, Kerberos), encryption/signing, and a comprehensive set of file and named‑pipe operations against remote SMB servers.
business_intent: Facilitates security testing, penetration testing, and automated administration of Windows file‑sharing services by allowing scripts to interact with SMB3 shares, authenticate, read/write files, and communicate over named pipes.
